layout.description: The layout to use. May be omitted if another page in the extension hierarchy defines one.

extends.description: The name of the page to extend.

features.description: For compositions: JSON schema describing the available configuration features.

areas.description: A map from area name to a list of widgets to display within that area.

widget.description: Path to the widget that should be rendered.

composition.description: Path to the composition that should be included.

layout.description: Path to the layout that should be inserted.

id.description: ID of the widget or composition. Will be generated if missing.

insertBeforeId.description: The ID of the widget this widget or composition should be inserted before.

features.description: Configuration of the features defined by the widget or composition.

enabled.description: Set to false to omit widgets e.g. for debugging purposes.

comment.description: Allows page author to comment on this widget instance.
